text:
Jungwon yang terlalu larut dalam ciuman, melenguh sejenak. Melepas ciuman keduanya karena terkejut akan reaksi Jay yang lebih cepat dari biasanya. Lalu memejamkan matanya menahan diri, ketika Jay menuju tengkuknya, mengecup rahangnya perlahan, nyaris seperti menggoda, membuat Jungwon mengerang, menjambak rambut hitam digenggamannya sebagai isyarat.
"J-Jay.."
"Mmm?"
Jay menghisap lehernya kuat, memberikan beberapa kissmark lain di bagian tengkuknya, mengigit ujung telinganya sensual, sebelum kemudian berpindah ke bibirnya lagi, mengecupnya beberapa kali diselingi lumatan kecil yang manis.
Jungwon seharusnya tahu. Ini yang akan terjadi ketika Jay mengiriminya pesan. Juga menelepon beberapa kali seperti menerornya. Ia tahu, tapi ia tetap datang.
Ia tetap datang, ingin Jay menciumnya, mencumbunya, menyentuhnya, melakukan apapun yang ia inginkan pada tubuhnya. Jungwon ingin Jay berada didalam dirinya. Dalam, panas dan bergairah.
trans:
Jungwon, that was too carried away in the kisses, sighed a little. Releasing her second kiss for being surprised to Jays reaction that was faster than the usual. Then she closed her eyes to restrain herself, as Jay aimed toward the nape of her neck, kissing her jaw slowly, almost like teasing, that made Jungwon moan, pulling the black hair in her grip as a gesture.
"J-Jay.."
"Mmm?"
Jay sucked her neck strongly, giving some other kiss marks on the nape of her neck, biting her sensual ear, before moving to her lips again, kissing her several times interspersed with sweet little kisses.
Jungwon should have known. This what would happen when Jay sent her a message. Also called her several times as if terrorizing her. She knew, yet she still came.
She still came, wanting Jay to kiss her, flirt her, touch her, do whatever she wanted him to do on her body. Jungwon wanted Jay inside her. Deep, hot and passionate.
